Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Grand/ Michigan.
ShortDescription: Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, State and Grand due to street blockage near Grand/ Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, State and Grand due to street blockage near Grand/ Michigan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/ Michigan
ShortDescription: Westbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, State and Grand due to street blockage near Grand/ Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, State and Grand due to street blockage near Grand/ Michigan.
